title:
Christmas is finally on its way here!

The holidays are about creating wonder and sharing joy with friends...

attachments.displayName:
Christmas is finally on its way here!

The holidays are about creating wonder and sharing joy with friends and loved ones over traditions we love most. Whether you want to make the season merrier with Starbucks® coffees and teas, surprise someone with an exciting treat, or find a festive way to tote your morning brew, Starbucks is the perfect destination to find gifts that share the joyful spirit of the holiday season!

Singapore customers can once again enjoy their favorite holiday beverages – Toffee Nut Latte, Peppermint Mocha and Cranberry White Chocolate Mocha – in the iconic Red Cups from 31 October 2013 to 5 January 2014.

The popular #Christmas Blends are also back – rekindle the spirit of the season as you gather with friends and family, and offer your guests the warmest of greetings with a delicious cup of Starbucks® coffee in your home. Whether it’s the beloved flavor of Starbucks® Christmas Blend, the spicy warmth of Starbucks® Christmas Blend Espresso Roast, the woodsy aroma of Starbucks® Holiday Blonde Roast or the comfort of instant Starbucks VIA® Ready Brew Christmas Blend, savor the tastes of the season with #Starbucks.

object.content:
Christmas is finally on its way here!
 
The holidays are about creating wonder and sharing joy with friends and loved ones over traditions we love most. Whether you want to make the season merrier with Starbucks® coffees and teas, surprise someone with an exciting treat, or find a festive way to tote your morning brew, Starbucks is the perfect destination to find gifts that share the joyful spirit of the holiday season!
 
Singapore customers can once again enjoy their favorite holiday beverages – Toffee Nut Latte, Peppermint Mocha and Cranberry White Chocolate Mocha – in the iconic Red Cups from 31 October 2013 to 5 January 2014.
 
The popular #Christmas Blends are also back – rekindle the spirit of the season as you gather with friends and family, and offer your guests the warmest of greetings with a delicious cup of Starbucks® coffee in your home. Whether it’s the beloved flavor of Starbucks® Christmas Blend, the spicy warmth of Starbucks® Christmas Blend Espresso Roast, the woodsy aroma of Starbucks® Holiday Blonde Roast or the comfort of instant Starbucks VIA® Ready Brew Christmas Blend, savor the tastes of the season with #Starbucks.
